original_title: Target’s CEO is stepping down as customers turn away | CNN Business
article_summary: Target CEO Brian Cornell is stepping down after 11 years, with Michael Fiddelke, Target's current COO, taking over on February 1, 2026. The change comes amid slumping sales and backlash over Target's retreat on DEI (Diversity, Equity, and Inclusion) initiatives. Target's stock has been among the worst performing.</s>
